dcterms:creator: Han Xiao

dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 60,000 grayscale images of handwritten digits, each sized at 28 x 28 pixels, commonly used for training various machine learning models.
dcterms:title: MNIST dataset

dcterms:creator: Han Xiao
Kashif Rasul
Roland Vollgraf
dcterms:description: A dataset designed to be similar to the MNIST dataset but contains images of clothing items, also consisting of 60,000 grayscale images sized at 28 x 28 pixels.
dcterms:title: MNIST Fashion dataset
